TopicTitle: Hey there fellow Kerbonauts! OPTI signing in.

Articles.Content:
I'm new to the forums. Or rather.. been lurking for a while but never really bothered to register until now.

So who am I?

28 yr cad-constructor who have a sickly interest in space and construction.

I mostly build spaceplanes theese days (although I really should get started on my Duna colonization program). The dream is to get 100T payload to LKO via SSTO plane (PB so far in 1.0x is ~50T). I have a twitch account where I stream occasionally. Sometime in the future I hope to get a schedule going.

Cheers!

After 3 years playing this game, I can get just under 7 tons to orbit with an SSTO. Let me know if I can give you any pointers. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Welcome to the forum.

Welcome! I don't have a twitch, my eyes are just fine, thank you. But it's nice of you to make your medical conditions public ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

But back on topic- Have fun here!
Welcome OPTI, enjoy your stay here. That's quite an ambitious spaceplane goal!
